Description: Seven fragments of dark brown hair string used as binding. The string consists of approximately 8 's'-spun elements, 'z'-plied together. Several fragments are knotted.
Bibliographic references: Adams et al 1999 / Kulubnarti III: The Cemeteries (p. 62)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Dr William Yewdale Adams
Donated by: W S Webb Museum of Anthropology (University of Kentucky)
Additional IDs: Excavation/small finds number: 93.2.4A (excavation object cat. no.)
